mapper.select: select teacher.name ,teacher.id,teacher.process from teacher,cource where teacher.id=cource.teacher_id and cource.name=#{name}
select date from cource ,teacher where cource.teacher_id=teacher.id and cource.name=#{name1} and teacher.name=#{name2}
select cource.id from cource,teacher where cource.teacher_id=teacher.id and cource.name=#{courcename2} and teacher.name=#{teachername2} and date=#{date2}
select count(id) from stu where tclass_id=(select tclass_id from cource,teacher where teacher.name=#{teachername} and date=#{time} and cource.name=#{courcename})
